attributes.action: ensure that the DFES provide guidelines for the use of biometric technologies in schools.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Department for Education and Skills does not currently provide advice to Local Education Authorities on what biometric technologies are appropriate in school buildings. No central records are held on the type or use of the technologies. We think that the DFES should investigate the proliferation of biometric technologies to ensure that the civil liberties of our children continue to be protected.

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister "to ensure that the DFES provide guidelines for the use of biometric technologies in schools.

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here:
